caption: Peppino's is my go- to whenever I want Italian and have always been very very impressed. I tried their catering menu for a birthday party of about 20 people, and everything was AMAZING. All of my guests were raving about the food. I highly recommend for both dinner and catering. Best restaurant in Bay Ridge!

You gotta have their pizza! It's so good compared to others places in Bay Ridge and I've tried 99% of them. I also like their chicken parm with linguine.  Whenever I'm feeling HANGRY I order that to feel satisfied.
If you dont know it, you should. If you are considering ordering from Peppino, you should One of the best places in the Borough. I love it!

The place is just amazing! Never had such authentic brick oven Pizza like this place serves! You guys rock! The waitress was professionally mannered, very friendly and even hooked us up with a apple crumb pie on the house! The pizza melts in your mouth and is just so mouth watering delicious! They definitely earn 5 stars! Brooklyn’s Finest Italian Pizza is here!
Best Philly cheesesteak sandwiches but worst service. Never friendly, always rude.

I just had a delivery, I was blown away at the quality of the food, the pizzas were hot and fresh, the eggplant was perfect the salads fresh and crisp!  Prepared perfectly, wrapped perfectly, packed perfectly.  Thank you Peppinos, well done!
BEST arrabbiata pasta i’ve ever had - pictured here with orecchiette. The veggie pizza with white onion, tomato, mozz, and roasted bell pepper was also to die for.

Peppinos has really amazing pizza. We love it at our house! We always order to smalls for selection, a hoagie (either chicken or eggplant parmesan) and some kind salad. We love their red sauce! It really makes the pizza sing! I think there's something a little bit magical about New York City pizza, right? No matter what part of the city you happen to be in. They are popular do if you're getting delivery, expect it when it's ready, not when you want it. Xoxo!
Great pizza great food. The very  best few pizza places  in Bay Ridge  great service salute to you all in Peppino

I loved Peppinos pastas. They’re definitely a great classic Italian restaurant. Other reviews have mentioned this and like they say, Peppinos is mostly always busy so if you come on a weekend like I did, be prepared to wait a bit. That being said the staff is very kind and of course the food is well worth the wait. I just wish they added some gluten-free pasta or pizza options to their menu. I still ordered pasta when I came to eat with friends and I’m glad I did as it was heavenly. Definitely worth the gluten cheat day.
this is the place to go if you're looking for great food.

Wow... the food is just delish! Peppino's recently reopened and the office has been relying on this place for catered lunch. Service is friendly and professional.  Love, love, love their penne alla vodka! Bruschetta and their mini calzone (or rolls) also a big hit. Can't wait till this crazy world returns to normal so people can dine in at this amazing place. Definitely bookmarked for myself and recommend to all.
Surely a spot worth trying, the food is awesome and well prepared, the rates are convenient and it is regularly neat here. Great work.
TOP Quality Italian food, everything is so good and the staff is so sweet!
The food is amazing!
Cheesesteak special. Mmmmmmm yummmm mmmm. Good.
Good food
Lisa was wonderful and very attentive to our table.  Super pizza too!
Best cheese steaks ever.

1 year ago, this place did a really nice job of capturing a philly cheese steak. They have not only lost this, but the have lost all efforts to try to put out good food. It's just a business now. It's expensive, and are in need or a re invention. Whoever they have as a chief, undercuts what the amazing owners have looked for. I am open to changing my review if they remove the current garbage chief
Atmosphere is great... Food is great...

(Translated by Google) Delicious home-cooked food, spaghetti Bolognese, pizza, lentil soup, garlic bread, homemade bread with butter - all this is just a jumble !!!! Real jam!! And besides, the friendly and attentive waiters, in any case, we were lucky!  (Original) Очень вкусная еда, по-домашнему приготовленная, спагетти Болоньезе, пицца, чечевичный суп, чесночный хлеб, домашний хлеб со сливочным маслом - все это просто объедение!!!! Пальчики оближешь!! И кроме того, приветливые и внимательные официанты, во всяком случае, нам повезло!
Delicious food, great atmosphere and impeccable service. This trifecta makes us weekly customers and the number 1 place we recommend in the neighborhood.

The pizza is absolutely superb. But in addition to pizza, try the meatballs. I've had it with a couple of people and they agree with me when they say it's the BEST meatballs that we've had in our lives. Literally was asking for more bread to wipe the sauce off the dish!
We got delivery for 20 people without plates, forks , napkins, cups . Food was great but it was looks like few trays were damaged during delivery.
Great Pizza and food with reasonable prices.
Great food as always.
Food was amazing! Staff very pleasant
The food is always great. Same with the service. And you can't beat the atmosphere, just a fun little place
Excellent food mot great!!!
Pizza is great! Pasta is tasty. I gave 4 stars because this place is overpriced. Manhattan prices for Bay Ridge place.

The food at Peppino's is great and the waiters and waitresses are very nice. Because of this, it's a very popular place, which is good for the most part, but it causes slow service. My family and I have been there 3 times so far and we would've definitely gone more if 2 out of the three times the service wasn't so slow. It was understandably very busy the 2 out of 3 times we went, but they should work on that. The manager was very kind and generous those 2 times and apologized severely for making us wait for our food for so long. They made up for it, so it wasn't too bad.
This place deserves 10 stars.the best pizza in Brooklyn great ppl working inside what else is there to say the place is awesome
Excellent service and great food!!
Delicious pizza good size portions and excellent service!
Chicken parm hero on their bread but all in vodka sauce 👌
My wife and I have eaten here a few times, and have not been disappointed yet.  Love the white wine mussels and the Penne All Arrabbiata.
Food was excellent. Waitress was great.

My favorite pizza in all of Brooklyn. I have to say that for the first time, I actually went to Peppino's rather than had it delivered and it was absolutely fantastic. In my experience, a lot of great pizza places in the borough do a lot of things right, but Peppino's is one of the few that does them all, and the one that does them best. The crust, the sauce, the quality and proportion of the toppings, the consistency of the product--I know when I get a pizza from here it's gonna be exactly what I want. They are not cheap, but I get what I pay for.
The vodka sauce pizza is out of this world. Oddly, so are the Philly Cheesesteaks. I go there often and love it but admittedly, it is a little expensive for a pie.
Very nice, familiar,cozy and nice pizzas.
Love it good place to take your wife and kids your girlfriend friends family very nice place the food is excellent
The pizza is amazing as well as the spaghetti and meatballs. Service was good and it was a chilled environment
Great service, and the food was amazing! They were able to comfortably accommodate my large group with no issue, and everything was fantastic.
Great food great atmosphere and a real Brick Oven.
food is ok, space is cramped
Bay Ridge's favorite restaurant.
Best cheese steak in NYC!
Banging Food !! A must try!

Amazing pizza!!!!! I absolutely love pizza and this is by far one of my favorite brick oven pizza places. The pizza is amazing!!! Their pasta dishes are also delicious, they use fresh ingredients. I love this place.
Very good food and service
Great food super fresh great staff and family friendly my highly recommend.
Pizza was great ! Will definitely come back for the vodka pie
Good food, large amount of menu selections and decent service.  Ambience could be a much better but overall a good experience.
Wonderful, real New York pizza!
The pizza is fantastic and so are the stuffed clams.  The staff here are wonderful, I highly recommend.
Friendly staff,  excellent brick oven pizza
Great pizza at great prices. Other Italian dishes good too. Owns liquor store across street. Can get food and wine delivered!
Consistently Good
The pizza woke up my taste buds with its flavor! Nice atmosphere and friendly service. would definitely recommend.
Food and service fantastic as always. Penna Alla vodka with peas Prosciutto and sun dried tomatoes
Pizza was good, bathroom was clean.
Excellent  food and service even better!
My new favorite pizza place. Wonderful food,  comfy atmosphere,  really nice wait staff! Bravo! :-)
Overpriced, undercooked
Great food and atmosphere
The pizza was fantastic, and the service awesome!
Great place, delicious pizza

Just a terrific family restaurant. The prices are very fair, the food is delicious, and service is very good. It is traditional Italian restaurant fare but that simply means while you can get chicken parmesan the sauce is real sauce and not Ragu from jar. There is taste, there is flavor and seasoning in everything there. My guest and I were delighted with our meals.
Great taste, great people....average prices
Amazing food, great prices with a wide variety
Love their sandwiches!
Great little spot pizza is great as is the rest of the menu
Have known the owner since I was little, great people . Great food, Great service, great place! I recommend it 100%.
Excellent service and the food is great!
My new favorite neighborhood spot for pizza. So unsuspecting and so good!
Favorite pizza in nyc
Great food. Reasonable prices. The staff is cordial and accommodating. I had a great time and meal here. Joe the manager was terrific too. Loved my visit
Excellent food
Great service and great food
It's like being family when you walk in. Pizza is delicious too
Great heros

Excellent service from the moment I walked in to the moment I walked out. In between that, I had a delicious margherita pizza (the baby size is perfect for one person). As an appetizer, I had their garlic crusts which were unique to their restaurant and also very tasty. Everything was done to perfection, from the atmosphere of the restaurant, to the food.
Great old school Italian joint, but it is starting to fading with new places.
Amazing Philly cheese steaks
Great atmosphere. Calzones very large, excellent made to order. Delish.
THE BEST PIZZA IN BAY RIDGE !!! Highly recommended. Great service. Will definitely  come back!
Classic bayridge real Italian pizza. Service was great. Had a very old school nyc italian feel. Cozy. Food was good and of course drink some cold peroni on tap. Goes great with a slice.

Where to start, the service is amazing, feel like i am at a family members house. The bread... second to none, cheesteaks give anyone in ny a run for their money. I havent even talked about the italian food. The penne vodka...mussels...shrimp oregenata, calzone, pizza i dunno, i have had just about every item on the menu, as well as some that arent. As good as it gets for an overall brooklyn italian restaurant.

One of my family favorite restaurants.  Always family friendly and the food is always delicious and fresh.  The staff care about there customers experience. If you haven't been ! Go you won't regret it
Ok
Just like old country
Food is never disappoints. Service is one of the best I've ever experienced! Always friendly and attentive!
Great food and people
Fresh, made to order, delicious!

I've walked by this place a thousand times. There are no shortage of pizzerias in Bay Ridge. It was chilly last night and as I washed by, I figured I'd stop in. It's definitely a no frills type of place which is fine with me.  The antipasto was good, the pizza was fantastic. No complaints at all. If you're looking for a good slice, check out Peppino's

Many will argue about the quality of pizza especially a neighborhood like Bay Ridge where there are many pizza shops large and small. The Margarita Pizza over here exceptional by all standards. Somewhat wheelchair accessible
Cozy Italian Restaurant, very good service.  Excellent local place. I eat there or order on a regular basis.
Food so fresh and delicious.
Phili cheese steak is seriously good!!
where the locals eat
Alright.place

This is the best pizza I've found so far in Park Slope. Thin yet sturdy crust, delicious toppings. They have the mini-pepperonis that are harder to find at most places and they're great. We always order the margherita with pepperoni. Delivery is also insanely fast...so so fast.
Some.of the best pizza in Bay Ridge that I've tried. And the staff is super friendly and helpful.
Pizza and pasta both good! Great crust. Very friendly and attentive service! Can I move y'all to Charlotte??
Excellent food
Amazing pizza.. Great service! Neighborhood place
Great boutique pizza...pricey but delicious.
Excellent thin crust pies.
Large portions. Delicious flavor to everything. Reasonably priced highly recommend
Great Pizza.  Usually crowded.
Yummy food, and nice people 😊
As always delicious
Best Italian place I tried, I highly recommend the shrimp orgnata and the cheese steak sandwiches and all the appetizers are delicious
Best brick oven pizza
I don't like the food, the calzone cold and not taste good, the pizza have good flavor but cold too, I like the service. Is good place to drink something with your friend or family

Tucked back and off the street on campus, the Thunderbird Executive Inn & Conference Center is relaxing and comforting. We spent 3 nights before and after our flight to Hawaii and it was just the place to be. The snacks are available 24/7 which suited us with our late night schedules. Staff was professional, room was spacious

Good food with a cozy atmosphere. We had pasta and a calzone, which were tasty and ample portions for the price. The only issue was that there was only one waitress covering lunch, so the service was a little bit slow, but she did a great job in spite of that.
Delicious food.  Friendly service.  They only use top quality fish- wild and meats- from Faicco.  The shrimp scampi is excellent and the pasta boscaiola is delicious and creamy
(Translated by Google) The food is very delicious  (Original) La comida es muy riquisima

Their pies are unique in all of Brooklyn pizzerias I've had. Their pies are on the small side, but I love the airy/thin texture of the crust. Although I'm a New Yorker, I prefer the Chicago deep dish pizza, Peppino's thin and light pizza style is great!  As for appetizers, order the bruschetta (maybe 2 orders). It's hearty! Maybe a little less olive oil next time as it made the bread a little too soggy, but the flavor is there! Don't forget to stop by their new sister establishment across the street for wine and liquor.
One of the best cheesesteaks in bay ridge.
Great Food   They make you feel at home. Thank you

After a movie with my Family❤ we were looking for a place to eat that was more affordable than a sit-down restaurant. But, we didn't want just ANY PIZZA,,,there's nothing like Brick-Oven Pizza🍕🍕🍕 DELICIOUS,,DEFINITELY GOING BACK👍👍👍
Great little place. This is a small family owned Italian restaurant. All of their food is fresh and delicious. Their bread is to die for. I highly recommend the sandwiches.
Good food!🍷
Family style pizza
Amazing food sometimes long wait but always treats me good

Excellent, excellent family style restaurant. The most amazing pizza in New York! If I want the most amazing brick oven pizza and I am in Bay Ridge, this is the place to satisfy this craving. I absolutely love this place. Every time I am here, I am family. All dishes you'd expect in an Italian family.
Loved it! Food is out of this world, best Italian food in Brooklyn, philly cheessteak delicious. It's a must try.
Just started working in the area over the summer and this is one of my favorite places for food. Their sandwiches are amazing! Garlic crisps are good too. Great sauce too!
Great brick oven Pizza
I love this place. Pizza is good and staff is nice. A very small and nice place.

Hated it. The broccoli rabe had no taste and the garlic was burnt. The other dish I had was a pasta dish with vegetables. No taste and almost no vegetables. The pasta was undercooked. I thought this was an Italian restaurant. The service was good though. The waitress saw the look on our faces and brought us a dessert without us saying anything. Extremely disappointed to say the least. This review was not by Steven(he wasn't there), but by his father, Alan
Great plates ..sometimes burned pizza crusts minus one star..but quality food. .a little overpriced and crowded..love the capers and marinara pie

We came here twice on our trip to Brooklyn and both times we were super impressed with this place. There are tons of amazing restaurants in New York, but we chose to come here twice because it was so good. The servers really care about their jobs and go above and beyond to make sure the customers are happy. I can't decide what's better here: the servers or the food. The pizza has the best crust I've ever tasted and all of their tomato sauce tastes real and fresh. This is for sure one of the highlights of our trip.

Actual prices were 15 to 20% higher than the online menu.....Meatball Parm Hero online price was $8.50.....actual price $10.50. Garlic Crisps online were $3.50......actual price $4.75. My Friday night delivery order took 75 minutes on a 45 minute estimate so the food was luke warm and a little soggy. Girl who took my order was nice but busy and did not give me an total price before she hung up. Place may have possibilites onsite but not for deliveries.....MUST UPDATE ONLINE MENU
Make sure to try the meatballs.
OMG!! THE BEST OF EVERYTHING. PASTA FSGOLI BEST I've ever had. Great pizza great everything. Very  ice people. Great delivery service. Great prices. A must treat!;)
Welcome home.  This is a neighborhood pizza Italian restaurant.  It has great choices on pizza pies.  Get yourself a eggplant roll.  It's delicious.

This place got some great authentic Italian food. Everything taste good. Just go there from time to time to try out the whole menu. Trust me you will not regret it. I only choose the best in Brooklyn.

I ordered an antipasto with fresh mozzarella/tomato/artichokes/salami and loads of other mouth watering goodness. Followed by a pasta (penne vodka with peas also available with Prosciutto ) split it with a friend and ordered a baby pie, as i heard so much about this place i wanted to try out the pizza. It was amazing, we had the vodka pizza and all i can say is YUM. Best Pizza place in Brooklyn, wish such a friendly staff and family feeling. as the website says i do love peppinos!
